select ch.id as id, cm.name as customerName, ch.transTime as transTime, e.name as transUser, e2.name as oldSeller, e3.name as newSeller, ch.transReason as transReason from customer_handover as ch left join customer_contacts as cm on ch.customerID = cm.id left join employee as e on ch.transUser = e.id left join employee as e2 on ch.oldSeller = e2.id left join employee as e3 on ch.newSeller = e3.id where ( e2.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or e.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or e3.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or cm.tel like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or cm.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
and ch.transTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
